name: TheClincastBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The ClinCast Briefing microcast about current events and news in clinical research. Check back daily for news that you can use!

You can find out more via the "My Clincast" companion Alexa skill and Flipboard Magazine by the same name.

This skill was designed, developed, and is hosted by Witlingo. If you would like your very own cast, send an email to contact@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
